"Barry": "Looks like you got 'em all! Whew, that's a huge weight off my shoulders. Thanks."
"Listen, as thanks for protecting my field, I'll send a bunch of fresh vegetables your way later."
"Oh, and here, take this Resta Sign. This should heal up any marks they might have left."
"That reminds me, there's a guy who wants to speak with you."
"An ARKS, goes by the name of Bosey. I think he should be over by the water fountain."
